text: N’iyo basomewe amagambo yacu asobanutse, baravuga bati “Uyu (Muhamadi) nta kindi ashaka usibye kubabuza (kugaragira) ibyo ababyeyi banyu basengaga. Bakavuga bati “Iyi (Qur’an) ni ikinyoma cyahimbwe.” Ndetse abahakanyi ubwo ukuri kwabageragaho baravuze bati “Iyi (Qur’an) ni uburozi bugaragara.”
